name: Pollie Party!
description:
Polly Party is a 2-4 network-based series of minigames, where each player represents a political party.

With each minigame won, players will earn their party votes. When the rounds are over, the party with the most votes wins!

___________________________________________

Known bugs:

A lot of them. Currently, players spawn as the same prefab, and there's only one minigame. But as the structure is further refined, we hope to release more minigames for this application.

Controls:

Mash the left and right arrow keys to move your #FakeTradie-in-a-wheelbarrow to the finish line first!
